title: [Tuts Plus] Build a CMS in Symfony 2 Video Tutorial-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Build a CMS in Symfony 2 Video Tutorial-KTR

About this course::

Building your own Content Management System (CMS) can be surprisingly simple. In this course we'll build a feature-packed content management system from scratch using the popular Symfony 2 PHP framework.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Introduction0
1.2Installation and Configuration
1.3Application Setup and Layout


2.Authentication and Authorization With the Security Bundle
2.1Generate User Entity and CRUD
2.2Set Up Security.yml: Authentication and Access Control
2.3Build the Security Controller


3.Content Management
3.1Generate Category Entity and CRUD06:56
3.2Generate Page Entity, CRUD and Relationships
3.3Build the Home Page
3.4Build the Show Page
3.5Creating Dynamic Menu Links


4.Conclusion
4.1Conclusion
